# isCaseIgnorable

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the scalar is ignored for casing purposes.

## Declaration

```swift
var isCaseIgnorable: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This property corresponds to the “Case_Ignorable” property in the [http://www.unicode.org/versions/latest/].
title: isCaseIgnorable
